attributes.action: remove the study of modern foreign languages from the compulsory GCSE syllabus.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thousands and thousands of teenagers throughout the UK take a GCSE in a modern language each year, but for what? I wonder what the percentage is of those who are taking foreign language GCSEs who will actually be required to speak it later in life. For many, it is a complete waste of class and study time, during which more relevent subjects to that particular pupil could be being studied.
